thread.title: Integrity Music Welcomes New Artist Folabi Nuel
thread.title_full: Integrity Music Welcomes New Artist Folabi Nuel

title: Integrity Music Welcomes New Artist Folabi Nuel
text:
Sep. 19, 2024 (BRIGHTON, UK) – Folabi Nuel, originally from Lagos, Nigeria and now based in London, is known for his inspiring worship that blends creative melodies with faith-filled lyrics.
Since 2016, Folabi has released several songs, including the popular single “Melody” with Limoblaze and Greatman Takit, which surpassed 1 million listens in its first year. His song “Yeshuah” from “Hunger – From Our Hearts to Yours (Live)” has touched listeners worldwide, leading him to perform at major Christian gatherings across the UK, Africa, Europe, and Canada.
With over 131k followers on Instagram and over 85k Spotify monthly listeners, Folabi’s heartfelt worship continues to reach a global audience.
"Integrity Music has been at the forefront of shaping Christian music for as long as I can remember and I truly appreciate the heart and family spirit of the team, especially those I've had the privilege of working with personally," Folabi commented.
"We're so looking forward to partner with Folabi on this journey," said Mark Bowater, European Business Development Director. "He is a worshipper first and foremost, as well as someone who lights up the spaces in which he writes and leads. We're privileged to serve these songs and help them travel around the globe."
Folabi's new single with Matt Redman, "Glory On The Other Side," is out Friday 27th September.
"The vision Matt and I share for writing 'Glory on the Other Side' is to offer people hope," said Folabi. "Now more than ever, we need songs that point people to Jesus, and I believe this song does just that. I'm also incredibly grateful for this partnership with Integrity Music."
Pre-Save "Glory On The Other Side."
Find out more information about Folabi at
folabinuel.net. Integrity Music is part of the David C Cook family, a nonprofit global resource provider serving the Church with life-transforming materials. With offices in both the US and the UK – Nashville, Tennessee and Brighton, East Sussex – Integrity Music is committed to help people world-wide experience the manifest presence of God and resource the church with songs of substance, in order that everyone has a part to play.
For more info on
[Folabi Nuel](/artists/FolabiNuel.asp), visit the JFH Artists Database.
Thu, 19 Sep 2024 16:25:00 EST
